tool.name: LocateRouteEvents

param.name: event_table
param.dialogReference: Table containing route ID, begin measure, and optionally an end measure

param.name: event_table_route_id_field
param.dialogReference: The route ID field in the event table

param.name: route_layer_route_id_field
param.dialogReference: The route ID field in the LRS layer

param.name: begin_m_field
param.dialogReference: The polyline begin measure or point measure field

param.name: end_m_field
param.dialogReference: Polyline end measure field. (Omit if locating point events)

param.name: route_id_suffix_type
param.dialogReference: Specify what format route IDs are in in the LRS route feature class.

param.name: out_fc
param.dialogReference: Output feature class. Other than the geometry field, the feature class will contain a field called EventOid which can be used to join with the input event table.

tool.summary: Locates route events along WA state routes

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Locates route events along WA state routes
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Created by Jeff Jacobson for WSDOT
